column4: I'm trying to find the users using the most disk space on a server -- is there a quick command to do this?  e.g. like "du /*/* -s --block-size=1G | sort -g" except for sorting by user instead of file
that would be a useful tool. don't know if it exists, though
you could use find with prinf %s and %u, and then parse with a quick perl script?
thanks, I think I found something similar at http://linuxgazette.net/18/disk_hog.html that I will try
